Description: Mummified fish. Identified as Anabas testudineus by Oliver Crimmen, Natural History Museum, London, July 2004.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story 2011 27th June - 31st August, Bowes Museum : Ancient Egypt
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co (?)
Acquisition notes: Note in Register records: 'Given by Cook's Agent in Luxor.'
